channel.title: CVE Feed for Simple DirectMedia Layer -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simple DirectMedia Layer -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-3977|2024-09-17T02:33:07.107Z -- simple%20directmedia%20layer -- simple%20directmedia%20layer
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the XCF image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.3. A specially crafted XCF image can cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.
